English

Publications

Special documenta 14 publications and merchandise are available at the main documenta venues in Athens, namely the National Museum of Contemporary Art (EMST), the Athens Conservatoire, the Benaki Museum and the documenta 14 press center (ERT building on Rigillis Str)

Publications and merchandise products are distributed online via the German webshop only.
